title: Bug 11069Prompting for saving a dirty shared editor inconsistent
description: Bug 11069Prompting for saving a dirty shared editor inconsistent
SR: 0214 build.Open Java file "A" in Workbench window 1.Dirty the editor.Open Workbenchwindow 2, and open the same resource while dirty.Try to close Workbenchwindow 2 (Alt+F4), you get prompted to save.Try to close Editor (Ctrl+F4),you don't get prompted.In either case you close the editor, but you only getprompted to save in the first scenario.
